reviews.review: you honestly can't go wrong with portal.
'Want You Gone' has been stuck in my head for four years help
A very fun game. I'd highly recommend you play this wonderful gem from VALVE
Es de los mejores juegos que he probado. Jugando con un amigo requiere de coordinación para poder pasar los niveles. Ademas los comentarios de la computadora central son muy cómicos
this game is very good why wont they make portal 3
Improving on everything that made Portal great, Portal 2 is longer and more elaborate than its predecessor, with all the same charm and humor.
A great puzzle Game with amazing Plot. A very good continuation of the first part. I wish there were more of these games.
one of the best puzzles, dialogues, voice acting and scenarios ever made. A must play
Not played this since 2011 and bruh, getting to that end credits song brought back some big nostalgia.
топ игра за свои деньги rep

An amazing game, would recommend it to anyone. Super satisfying playing with a friend or just by yourself. Had this game on the Xbox 360, Xbox One, and finally got it for my PC awhile ago. It holds a special spot in my heart for being one of the first games that I fell in love with. 11/10
this game is good from Valve. is an addictive campaign and cool cooperative mode. to be honest I highly recommend it :)
A game so essential to the history of video games that truly everyone should play it. An amazing game throughout, and one of the few games I would consider to be a masterwork.
Great Game. Even the most Baddest Computers can play this...somehow.

Portal 1'e göre daha uzun hikayesi,coop modu,kendin yaratabildiğin haritalar,yeni mekanikler,derin bir hikayesi.Bunlar tamamen özgü nedenleri.Ama asıl olay sanırım fiyatı.indirimde olmasa bile gönül rahatlığıyla söyleyebilirim ki oyunu alın.
This is the best game i've ever seen.

[h1]Шедевр на поприще игр с головоломками от ленивой студии.  [/h1]

Во-первых, игра предоставляет тебе возможность решить кучу головоломок. Я, как и многие из тех, кто это читает, обожаю головоломки. По-этому мне понравилась эта игра.

Во-вторых, в ней есть кооператив, что не может не радовать. Вечерком, с другом, поугарать и порешать головоломки - самое то.

В-третьих, в этой игре идеальный сюжет, с очень крутым послом. Ещё нам рассказывают многое, связанное с первой частью. [spoiler] Например, моей любимой частью игры, стала та часть, где нам рассказывают по-больше про Aperture Labaratories. Так же очень зашло раскрытие личности главы всей этой еб*ни. А про пасхалки к первой части серии вообще молчу. Но самой главной фишкой игры, стало раскрытие её посыла, что доверять нельзя, даже тем, кто вызволил вас даже из самой задницы. [/spoiler]

[h1] Рекомендую эту игру всем, кто ещё не успел насладиться сие шедевром. [/h1]
[b] 10/10 [/b]

Jeu très complet avec des puzzles plus ou moins compliqué.
Je le recommande !

퍼즐이 어렵긴 하지만 그래도 재미있는 겜이라고 생각합니다. 밸브의 마지막 패키지 발매작이자 키마조작 갓겜. 8년후 핲라 알릭스가 나왔지만 그건 VR 전용이라서 키마조작겜은 이게 마지막입니다.
Очень интересная игра. Сюжет прикольный. Качественная анимация и графон. Шуточки также гуд. Сложно к чему-то придраться.  Если в этой игре и есть минусы (а они есть), то они совсем не значительные.
I only played the co-op but I'm sure base game is just as fun.

Ola galera, gosto deste jogo pois me faz me sentir em um laboratório...(heheheh...como um macaco de laboratório).
Testando minha capacidade de sair da" situação", tenso, mas quando resolvo o problema me faz me sentir o máximo...já zerei no xbox360, e perdi o jogo pois era pirata  (o cd riscou), e nesta "quarentena" ter redescoberto isso ,me deixou muito feliz , ate arrisquei jogar online( nunca tinha jogado online nestes meus 46 anos de vida), foi uma experiencia muito boa, pena não ter muito mais gente para jogar, enfim ótimo jogo.

For a newbie to first-person puzzle game such as myself, Portal 2 is enormously fun and challenging. There were a few times that I got stuck in test chambers for more than an hour only to realize that the answers are either actually simple or already right in front of you. XD

Glados and Wheatly adds humor to the game, which is a big part of what makes Portal 2 awesome (especially Glados). Glados' mean streak streak, sarcasm, and passive-aggressive attitude might not be for everyone tho, but if you're into dark humor, you'll find this homicidal AI ironically likable and hilarious
